---
title: "Geometric Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rgeom-0.9.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Geom09Call <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.9-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Geom09Result <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.9-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Geom.09.OpenAI <- left_join(Geom09Call,Geom09Result)
Full.Geom.09 <- left_join(Geom09$params, Geom.09.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Geom.09.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Geom.09$Outcome <- map_chr(Geom09$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Geom09Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Geom.09$Outcome)
Full.Geom.09.1211 <- Full.Geom.09
```

```{r}
save(Full.Geom.09.1211, file="Full.Geom.09.1211.RData")
```
